text: The 2007 Wong Tai Sin District Council election was held on 18 November 2007 to elect all 25 elected members to the 29-member District Council. ==Overall election results== Before election: {| style="width:50%; text-align:center;" |+ ↓ |- style="color:white;" | style="background:green; width:52%;" | 13 | style="background:red; width:48%;" | 12 |- | Pro-democracy | Pro-Beijing |} Change in composition: {| style="width:50%; text-align:center;" |+ ↓ |- style="color:white;" | style="background:green; width:44%;" | 11 | style="background:red; width:56%;" | 14 |- | Pro-democracy | Pro-Beijing |} ==References== ==External links== * Election Results - Overall Results Category:2007 Hong Kong local elections
title: 2007 Wong Tai Sin District Council election
